CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 28 reads: " Free Prizes, Samples and Demonstrations Galore...14. The number one grand prize, a Norge Customatic Refrigerator, was awarded to Mrs. Sarah Murphy by William K. Appelt of the Ludwig Hommel and Company...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Prize winner Sarah Murphy, William K. Appelt, and unknown man and woman admiring refrigerator in Norge kitchen appliances display at the Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Electric apparatus and appliances--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
